titleStmt.title: Corona charitatis, = The crovvne of charitie a sermon preacht in Mercers Chappell, May 10. 1625. at the solemne funerals of his euer-renowmed friend, of precious memory, the mirroir of charitie, Mr. Richard Fishburne, merchant, and now consecrated as an anniuersary to his fame; by Nat: Shute, rector of the parish of Saint Mildred in the Poultry, London.
titleStmt.author: Shute, Nathaniel, d. 1638.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W. Stansby for Samuel Man, dwelling at the Swanne in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
